q: "Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti," Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. FILE- In this March 7, 1982 file photo, Cleopatra's... File photo of German Chancellor Merkel looking at... Queen Nefertiti, the ubiquitous, media-savvy Egyptian antiquities director whose... Egypt asks Berlin to

One of the CIA's victims was Mamdouh Habib , an Egyptian-born Australian citizen. U.S. agents bought him from Pakistani intelligence and shipped him to Egypt. "In Egypt," reports Lisa Hajjar for Al Jazeera, he was repeatedly subjected to electric shocks, immersed in water up to his nostrils and beaten. His fingers were broken and he was hung from metal hooks. At one point, his interrogator slapped him so hard that his blindfold was dislodged, revealing the identity of his tormentor: Omar Suleiman . Frustrated that Mamdouh Habib was not providing useful information or confessing to involvement in terrorism, Omar Suleiman ordered a guard to murder a shackled prisoner in front of Mamdouh Habib , which he did with a vicious karate kick. Ibn al-Sheikh al-Libi was a former trainer in the Afghan jihadi camps who famously "confessed" a connection between Saddam and Al Qaeda while under torture in one of Omar Suleiman 's dungeons. I viewed the tape and I suggested to Bob he should do all he could to verify the tape, though I believed it to be authentic on my first viewing and the tape was published.
